title: Roast duck with clementine & cherry sauce

ingredients.item: Juice of 3 Easy-Peeler Clementines, with peeled skin reserved
½ chicken stock cube, made up to 150ml with boiling water

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7.

Remove the duck from all packaging and remove the giblets from the cavity, place the duck in a roasting tin. Pour the juice of 1 clementine over the duck and place the skins in the cavity. Roast for 1 hour 40 minutes or until cooked throughout.
Meanwhile, place the remaining clementine juice and flesh pulp in a small saucepan with the cherries, stock and port (if using) and boil for 10 minutes, then season.
Heat the red cabbage according to pack instructions and serve with the duck and clementine sauce.
